IntegrationProviderDcsnRqmt.name: IntegrationProviderDcsnRqmt

IntegrationProviderDefId.description: The integration definition associated with the integration provider decision requirement.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

RunAsUserId.description: The user associated with the integration provider decision requirement.
